name: GuestMetrics
overview: GuestMetrics is the leading provider of Customer Insight Solutions for the hospitality industry. GuestMetrics is the Big Data company for the hospitality industry. Their tools are fully integrated with the leading point-of-sale (POS) systems and allow hospitality providers at every level of the market to improve business operations. From unique fine dining establishments to regional and national counter service chains, their tools for restaurateurs drive increased sales, profits, repeat visits and guest satisfaction. For the first time ever in the industry, GuestMetrics is able to present hospitality industry suppliers with accurate data for all brands in on-premise, in terms of market share, sales growth, and pricing, across the many strategic dimensions described below. Data is being gathered from tens of thousands of restaurants, bars and hotels.

acquisition.source_description: GuestTek International, Inc. Completes Sale of GuestMetrics to Shot Spirits Corporation for $5 Million

milestones.description: GuestMetrics LLC launches Business Intelligence services
